tit.cmt: 用語集の表記に修正Higashi (East)-Maizuru-koen Park →Higashi Maizuru Park

sen.j: 東舞鶴公園（ひがしまいづるこうえん）は、京都府舞鶴市にある公園。
sen.e: Higashi-Maizuru Park is located in Maizuru City, kyoto Prefecture.
Higashi-Maizuru koen Park is located in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Higashi Maizuru Park is located in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 用語集の表記に修正Higashi (East)-Maizuru-koen Park →Higashi Maizuru Park

sen.j: 別名は丸山公園（まるやまこうえん）。
sen.e: Another name of it is the Maruyama-koen park.
It is also known by the name Maruyama-koen park.
It is also known by the name Maruyama-koen Park.
sen.cmt: 指示書入力要領に従い修正Maruyama-koen park → Maruyama-koen Park

sen.j: テニスコートや野球場、児童公園などが完備しており、舞鶴市の市花に指定されているツツジが約25000本も植えられている。
sen.e: It is fully provided with tennis courts, a ball park and a children's park, and approx. 25,000 tress of Azalea, the Maizuru city-designated flower, are planted there.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It is fully provided with tennis courts, a ball park and a children's park, and approximately 25,000 azalea trees, the Maizuru city-designated flower, are planted there.
It is fully provided with tennis courts, a ball park and a children's park, and approximately 25,000 azalea trees, the Maizuru city-designated flower, are planted there.

sen.j: 毎年5月4日には舞鶴つつじまつりが開催されている。
sen.e: The Maizuru azalea festival is held on May 4 every year.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The Maizuru azalea festival is held on May 4 every year.
Maizuru Tsutsuji Matsuri (Azalea Festival) is held on May 4 every year.
sen.cmt: 用語集の表記に修正The Maizuru azalea festival → Maizuru Tsutsuji Matsuri (Azalea Festival)

sen.j: また公園内の高台から市内を一望でき、隠れた名所となっている。
sen.e: In addition, the park has become a secret beauty spot, because the entire city area can be viewed from its hill top.
In addition, the park has become a hidden beauty spot, because the entire city area can be viewed from its hill top.
In addition, the park has become a hidden beauty spot, because the entire city area can be viewed from its hill top.
The ball park at Higashi-Maizuru-koen Park
sen.cmt: 用語集の表記に修正Higashi-Maizuru-koen Park Ball Park→Higashi Maizuru Park Stadium

sen.j: 東舞鶴公園陸上競技場
sen.e: The athletic track field at the Higashi-Maizuru-koen Park
sen.cmt: 用語集の表記に修正Higashi-Maizuru-koen Park Athletics Track → Higashi Maizuru Park Athletic Stadium

sen.e: Observation decks and roads for enjoying walks
Observation decks and roads for enjoying walks
Observation decks and roads for enjoying walks

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道 舞鶴線 東舞鶴駅より車で約5分。
sen.e: Approx. five minutes by car from Higashi-Maizuru Station on the Maizuru Line of West Japan Railway Company
Approximately five minutes by car from Higashi-Maizuru Station on the Maizuru Line of West Japan Railway Company
Approximately five minutes by car from Higashi Maizuru Station on the Maizuru Line of West Japan Railway Company
sen.cmt: 用語集の表記に修正Higashi-Maizuru Station → Higashi Maizuru Station

sen.e: A concentration of red brick warehouses in Maizuru
